Title: Login with valid credentials
Steps: Go to login > Enter valid username/password > Click login

Title: Login with invalid password
Steps: Enter valid username but wrong password > Click login

Title: Add new employee with valid data
Steps: Login > PIM > Add Employee > Fill form > Submit

Title: Check that employee URL contains empNumber after creation
Logout
Steps: Login > Open user menu > Click Logout

Title: Search for existing employee
Steps: Login > PIM > Enter known name > Search

Title: Search result contains correct name
Steps: Validate that result includes searched name

Title: Validate error count
Steps: At least two required errors must be shown
